curam.core.impl.search.datatypes

Class DataTypeConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.core.impl.search.datatypes.DataTypeConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataTypeConverter

    public class DataTypeConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataTypeConverter
    This converter converts Field values between their respective data type value and a string representation to be indexed. Should deal with all Curam types as provided in SDEJ customers cannot extend these so we don't need to allow them to customize this. Deals with: strings, longs, curam.util.type.Date, curam.util.DateTime, Money, Boolean. No special processing for codetables - GSS at this level just operates on the codetable code string.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface curam.core.impl.search.datatypes.IDataTypeConverter

      • DataTypeConverter

        public DataTypeConverter()
        Initialize this DataTypeConverter with all the type converters. Types:- String, Long, Date, DateTime, Money, Boolean, Int, Short.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.reflect.Field cur,
                java.lang.Object structObj,
                CuramField value)
         throws AppRuntimeException
        Retrieves the appropriate converter and sets the specified structs field value with the CuramField value.
        Specified by:
        set in interface IDataTypeConverter
        Parameters:
        cur - the class field. Will use reflection in this object to set the structs field value.
        structObj - the struct object containing the field.
        value - value as read from the CuramDocument generated from the index search.
        Throws:
        AppRuntimeException - GSSSEARCHSERVER.ERR_SEARCH_SERVICE_DATA_CONVERSION if there is a problem during type conversion.

      • getAsString
